inclusion.criterion: Male or female migraineurs between 18 and 65 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aura consisting of at least one of the following, but no muscle weakness or paralysis:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Aura has at least two of the following characteristics:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Visual symptoms affecting only one side of the field of vision and/or sensory symptoms affecting only one side of the body
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least one aura symptom that develops gradually over more than 5 minutes and/or different aura symptoms occur in succession over more than 5 minutes
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Headache begins during the aura or follows aura within 60 minutes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Headache not attributable to another disorder
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Migraine pain following aura in at least 75% of occurrences
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Headache frequency of at least 1 migraine attack (with or without aura) per month for the past 3 months but not more than 8 migraines in any 30 day period.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of headaches that is not consistent with migraine with aura.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Presence of any risk factors that would preclude the use of triptans:
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy or hypersensitivity to triptans or history of any serious side effect with a triptan which would preclude further dosing with a triptan
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, but meets some inclusion criteria for migraine study.
